  • Method Details

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(Board b, int x, int y)
      Default move function. Moves the piece,removes any piece at target cell, increments turn, and does the piece's cell function.

    • getX

      public int getX()

    • getY

      public int getY()

    • getIsBlack

      public boolean getIsBlack()

    • CellFunction

      public abstract void CellFunction(Board b, int tx, int ty)
      The function the piece will enact when it moves to a new cell.

    • capturePiece

      public boolean capturePiece(Board b, int x, int y)
      Checks if there is a piece in the targeted position that can be captured. Returns true if there is, false if the cell is empty or of the same color.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object

    • getHVLineOfCells

      public int[][] getHVLineOfCells(int tx, int ty)
      Gets a Horizontal or Vertical line of cell positions, and returns them in a 2d Array. [[x,y],[x,y]] invalid input: '<'- each 1d array is a cell holding its positions. Does NOT return actual cell values.

    • getDiagonalCells

      public int[][] getDiagonalCells(int tx, int ty)
      Gets a Diagonal line of cell positions, and returns them in a 2d Array. [[x,y],[x,y]] invalid input: '<'- each 1d array is a cell holding its positions. Does NOT return actual cell values.

    • getPieceType

      public abstract String getPieceType()
      Returns subclasses name of piece. Pawn class returns "Pawn".
